casebody.data:
John R. VIDOLICH II, Trustee of John R. Vidolich II Trust, Plaintiff/Counterdefendant-Appellant,
v.
SALINE NORTHVIEW CONDOMINIUM ASSOCIATION, Defendant/Counterplaintiff/ Counterdefendant/Third-Party Plaintiff-Appellee,
and
Jovi Enterprises LLC, Counterplaintiff/Third-Party Defendant-Appellant,
and
Dawn E. Bednarski, Plaintiff. SC: 157249
COA: 334579 Supreme Court of Michigan. October 30, 2018

Order

On order of the Court, the application for leave to appeal the December 5, 2017 judgment of the Court of Appeals is considered, and it is DENIED, because we are not persuaded that the questions presented should be reviewed by this Court.
